long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WA Fast Sender and Automation Extension by So Lets Talk Digital (also known as “SLTD”):

•⁠  ⁠Personalised messaging features
•⁠  ⁠Unofficial enhancement tool for WhatsApp Web
•⁠  ⁠Privacy-focused; no sharing or distribution of user data
•⁠  ⁠Send single or bulk WhatsApp messages to contact numbers
•⁠  ⁠Upload Excel or CSV files for queued messages to any country
•⁠  ⁠Multiple formatting options like BOLD, italic, strikethrough, and EMOJI
•⁠  ⁠Additional tools for WhatsApp Web for enhanced privacy and reliability
•⁠  ⁠Yearly and lifetime subscription options via Razorpay or PayPal for unlimited use

Highlighted Features and Unique Selling Points (USPs) - Increase Social Presence Grow Your Business

•⁠  ⁠Chat automation
•⁠  ⁠No Per Message Cost
•⁠  ⁠Set Auto-Reply messages
•⁠  ⁠Fetch contacts from chat list
•⁠  ⁠Inbuilt number filter software
•⁠  ⁠Easy To Use & Instant Download
•⁠  ⁠Text editing & Multi-Language Text
•⁠  ⁠Time Scheduling & Personalize Message
•⁠  ⁠Send Text/images/Videos/Docs & Much More
•⁠  ⁠Send messages to all groups & broadcast lists
•⁠  ⁠Boost your business at the next level with just one click
•⁠  ⁠Pull out your contact list & WhatsApp contacts to be marketed
•⁠  ⁠Address messages personally by putting names in the excel sheet
•⁠  ⁠No Credit limit required; send messages without purchasing credits
•⁠  ⁠Upload contacts in excel sheet for multiple messages without saving numbers

These features collectively make the SLTD WAPP Sender and Automation Extension a comprehensive and powerful tool for WhatsApp messaging and automation
